sentences.english: It is loudest at the apex and may be accentuated by placing the patient in the left lateral decubitus position.
sentences.chinese: 心尖部位最响亮，病人处左侧卧位时听得最清楚。

sentences.english: If you sleep on your side, you have usually got a well-balanced personality.
sentences.chinese: 如果你侧卧而睡，则你性格平和。

sentences.english: Lying on one side is to avoid aspiration, on the left side is to make sure the gastro lumen is clear to watch.
sentences.chinese: 侧卧是为了防止误吸，左侧是为了确保胃腔清晰可见。

sentences.english: The animal is placed in a lateral recumbency and 2 needles are placed in the abdominal cavity.
sentences.chinese: 该动物被放置在一个侧卧和2针腔放置在腹部。

sentences.english: Palpation is best accomplished using the fingertips, with the patient either supine or in the left lateral decubitus position.
sentences.chinese: 触诊时最好用指尖，病人处仰卧位或左侧卧位。

sentences.english: Assist client to sitting or side-lying position.
sentences.chinese: 协助病人取坐位或侧卧位。

sentences.english: If the patient vomits, let him or her lie on the side to prevent the respiratory tracks from being blocked.
sentences.chinese: 如果患者呕吐，应让他侧卧防止堵塞呼吸道。

sentences.english: It was suggested that the alternatively right and left lateral position was the ideal position for treatment of hyphema .
sentences.chinese: 两侧侧卧位是治疗前房积血的较为理想的体位。

sentences.english: You are to eat it during the 390 days you lie on your side.
sentences.chinese: 要按你侧卧的三百九十日吃这饼。

sentences.english: The hospital Hunan intestines request the patient to take the side decubitus on the bed to carry on steeply.
sentences.chinese: 医院湘肠要求患者峭在床上取侧卧位进行。

sentences.english: Feeding position to be taken sitting or half-sitting, the side in favor of emptying the milk.
sentences.chinese: 喂奶姿势宜采取坐式或半坐式，侧卧有利于排空乳汁。

sentences.english: Nap position to be lying in the supine or lateral.
sentences.chinese: 午睡姿势宜平躺仰卧或侧卧为佳。

sentences.english: Rolling to her side, she glimpsed one more time at what was left of his.
sentences.chinese: 转身侧卧，她再一次瞥见他留下的东西。

sentences.english: Lie down on the floor on your side and do leg lifts for five minutes. (50 calories)
sentences.chinese: 侧卧在地板上，抬腿，持续5分钟。
